contentrichtext.text: {{infobox officeholder | name = Hyrum Rex Lee | image = | order = 44th | office = Governor of American Samoa | term_start = May 24, 1961 | term_end = August 1, 1967 | predecessor = [[Peter Tali Coleman]] | successor = [[Owen Aspinall]] | order2 = 50th | office2 = Governor of American Samoa | term_start2 = May 28, 1977 | term_end2 = January 3, 1978 | predecessor2 = [[Frank Barnett]] | successor2 = [[Peter Tali Coleman]] | birth_date = {{birth date|1910|4|8}} | birth_place = [[Rigby, Idaho]] | death_date = {{death date and age|2001|7|26|1910|4|8}} | death_place = [[La Jolla, California]] | nationality = [[United States|American]] | party = [[Democratic Party (United States)|Democrat]] | spouse = Lillian "Lily" Lee (?–2010) }} '''Hyrum Rex Lee''' (April 8, 1910 – July 26, 2001), usually called '''H. Rex Lee''', was the last non-elected [[Governor of American Samoa]]. He was governor from May 24, 1961 to July 31, 1967 and from May 28, 1977 until January 3, 1978. He was the seventh appointed civilian Governor of American Samoa. Born in [[Rigby, Idaho]] and a Democrat, Lee served as [[Federal Communications Commission]] commissioner from 1968 to 1973.<ref>[http://politicalgraveyard.com/bio/lee4.html Bio data]</ref> Lee died at his home in [[La Jolla, California]], on July 26, 2001, at the age of 91. He had 5 children (three daughters and two sons). He was a friend of entertainment mogul [[Walt Disney]], who visited the Lee family and stayed at their home. His wife, Lillian Lee, died in April 2010 at the age of 97. ==External lists== *[http://americansamoa.gov/tapuitea/2007/Tapuitea70731.pdf Tapuitea: Historical Notes, July 31, 2007, page 4] ==Notes== {{reflist}} {{s-start}} {{s-gov}} {{succession box | title=[[List of American Samoa Governors|Governor of American Samoa]]<br>(1st Term) | before=[[Peter Tali Coleman]] | after=[[Owen Stuart Aspinall]] | years=1961–1967 }} {{succession box | title=[[List of American Samoa Governors|Governor of American Samoa]]<br>(2nd Term) | before=[[Frank Barnett]] | after=[[Peter Tali Coleman]] | years=1977–1978 }} {{s-end}} {{Governors of American Samoa}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Lee, Hyrum Rex | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = American politician | DATE OF BIRTH = April 8, 1910 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = July 26, 2001 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Lee, Hyrum Rex}} [[Category:1910 births]] [[Category:2001 deaths]] [[Category:People from Rigby, Idaho]] [[Category:Governors of American Samoa]] [[Category:American Samoa Democrats]] [[Category:American Samoan Latter Day Saints]] [[Category:Members of the Federal Communications Commission]] [[Category:People from La Jolla, San Diego]] {{US-politician-stub}}
